rukus.text: 33|59|He nabi! Apani apanara striderake, kan'yaderake o muminadera nariderake baluna, tara yena tadera cadarera kichu ansa nijedera upara tene deya [1]. Ete taderake cena sahajatara habe phale taderake utyakta kara habe na [2]. Ara allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu.

33|60|Munaphikara ebam yadera antare byadhi ache ara yara nagare gujaba ratana kare, tara birata na hale amara abasya'i tadera birud'dhe apanake prabala karaba; erapara e nagarite apanara pratibesirupe tara sbalpa samaya'i thakabe
33|61|abhisapta haye; taderake yekhane'i pa'oya yabe sekhane'i dhara habe ebam nirdayabhabe hatya kara habe [1].
33|62|Age yara atita haye geche tadera byapare eta'i chila allahara riti. Ara apani kakhano allahara ritite kono paribartana pabena na.
33|63|Lokera apanake kiyamata samparke jijnesa kare. Baluna, 'era jnana sudhu allahara nikata'i ache.' Ara kise apanake janabe, sambhabata kiyamata sighra'i haye yete pare
33|64|niscaya allah kaphiraderake karechena abhisapta ebam tadera jan'ya prastuta rekhechena jbalanta aguna
33|65|sekhane tara cirasthayi habe ebam tara kono abhibhabaka pabe na, kono sahayyakari'o naya.
33|66|Yedina tadera mukhamandala agune ulata-palata kara habe, sedina tara balabe, 'haya! Amara yadi allahâ€Œke manatama ara rasulake manatama
33|67|tara aro balabe, 'he amadera raba! Amara amadera neta o bara lokadera anugatya karechilama ebam tara amaderake pathabhrasta karechila
33|68|he amadera raba! Apani taderake dbiguna sasti dina ebam taderake dina maha'abhisampata.
